entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
